keyboards.name: Quionix75
keyboards.description: These low-profile keyboard are your perfect fast clickers. Featuring a durable rubber outer, they'll withstand bilions of clicks & drops from table (not tested).

keycaps.name: Black
keycaps.description: Compatible with major-sizes keyboard including but not limited to 60%, 64-key, 65%, TKL, 75%, 96%, 1800 compact, Alice, and full-size keyboards.

keycaps.description: Compatible with major-sizes keyboard including but not limited to 60%, 64-key, 65%, TKL, 75%, 96%.

barebonekits.name: ACR TOP 75 Kit
barebonekits.description: Note: This keyboard comes completely un-assembled. Top Mount Barebone Kit Brass Plate (plate files will be available)/Additional FR4 Plate for the Space Gray Aluminum Version Akko double-shot TPU plate mount stabilizer (supports screw-in stabilizer) South-facing PCBa Akko 5-pin Hotswap Socket Case foam is moulded Backlit RGB (Acrylic version only – backlit was removed on aluminum version to optimize sound profile).
